DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if fractional carbon dioxide laser treatment of a burn scar is a more effective method for improving the appearance of scars than the current available treatments.
DOC.brief_title: Burn Scar Appearance After Treatment With Fractional Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Laser
DOC.criteria: Have a mature burn scar and desire revision Fluent in English Must reside in the Los Angeles vicinity for the duration of the study Previous history of scar revision NonEnglish speakers Pregnant or cognitively impaired subjects
